meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Deborah Beams Lee Barrow Jane Joseph Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7509.

td.p: Deborah Beams, a certified public accountant from Dallas, Texas
Lee Barrow, a history and economics teacher from Denver, Colorado
Jane Joseph, a bond analyst from Wilmington, Delaware (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,402)

tr.td: LITERARY QUOTES
THE BODY
CATCH THE QUECHUA WORD
MOVIE ADJECTIVES
SAY IT WITH CHOCOLATE
"B" MY LOVE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"Shoot all the blue jays you want, if you can hit \'em, but remember it\'s a sin to kill" one of these')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "Shoot all the blue jays you want, if you can hit 'em, but remember it's a sin to kill" one of these
